metadata.synopsis: An aspiring young comic looking for his big break on the radio attempts to solve a series of on-air murders.

reviews: (Clooney and Farmiga) keep the wit and chemistry bouncing back and forth like a modern-day Tracy and Hepburn, if you can picture Hepburn sashaying across a hotel room wearing nothing but a man's necktie looped around her waist.
George Clooney is amazing in this even though he wasn't even born at the time it was made!
